Package edu.berkeley.compbio.sequtils.strings

Interface Summary
FirstWordProvider Interface for objects that are able to provide a list of the "first words" associated with a sequence spectrum.
KcountScanner Provides an interface for classes that can scan sequences to count the occurrences of substrings
SequenceSpectrum<T extends SequenceSpectrum> Represents a statistical model of a sequence of bytes.
SequenceSpectrumScanner Provides an interface for classes that can scan sequences to count the occurrences of substrings
 

Class Summary
AggregateSequenceFragment  
DoubleKcount<T extends DoubleKcount> Represents the counts of a set of given patterns appearing in a string.
DoublePseudocountAdder  
HierarchicalSpectrum<T extends HierarchicalSpectrum>  
InferredMixturePST Deprecated.
IntKcount<T extends IntKcount> Represents the counts of a set of given patterns appearing in a string.
IntPseudocountAdder  
Kcount<T extends Kcount>  
KneserNeyPSASmoother  
LairdSaulPST  
MarkovTreeNode A node in a tree where each transition is labeled by a byte and has a local probability (that is, conditional on the parent node).
RonPSA  
RonPSANode Extends a MarkovTreeNode with backlinks, for making make a Probabilistic Suffix Automaton (PSA).
RonPSASmoother  
RonPST A probabilistic suffix tree, as described in

D.
RonPSTNode A node of a Probabilistic Suffix Tree, where each symbol is a byte.
RonPSTSmoother  
SequenceFragment Manages information about a sequence fragment, including its metadata and any statistics that have been calculated from the sequence, in the form of SequenceSpectra.
SimplexVectorTargetAndProportion<T>  
 

Exception Summary
SequenceSpectrumException Thrown when something involving a SequenceSpectrum goes wrong, such as when a requested spectrum cannot be computed.
SequenceSpectrumRuntimeException Thrown when something involving a SequenceSpectrum goes wrong, such as when a requested spectrum cannot be computed.
